front.title: Secure IP Multicast: Problem areas, Framework, and Building Blocks

abstract.t: This document provides a foundation for the research work done as the Secure Multicast Group (SMuG)of the IRTF. The document begins by introducing a Reference Framework and problem areas, and proceeds to identify functional building blocks for a secure multicast solution. The identified building blocks, their definition and realization will be the subject of future work of SmuG.
